abstract: The government faces years of legal bills to defend Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac executives accused of misleading investors about subprime mortgages.
snippet: The government faces years of legal bills to defend Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac executives accused of misleading investors about subprime mortgages.
lead_paragraph: The government’s takeover of the mortgage giants Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac in 2008 may turn out to be a very expensive proposition.

headline.main: Adding Up the Government’s Legal Bills for Fannie and Freddie

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
